Description: Job Description :- Pega certified DCO architect desirable.- Responsible for leading the business in process improvement efforts while gathering requirements for new and existing processes- Lead business workshops around software products and processes- Works closely with Product Owner and Stakeholders to gather user stories and translate into business requirements- Ensures that user stories contain acceptance criteria for all activities as well as defined test scenarios for both positive and negative results- Facilitate DCO sessions/discovery sessions along with LSA CSSA- Coordinate with Product Owner and stakeholders to facilitate backlog reviews- Understanding business process management and business requirements of the customers and translating them to user stories- Collaborate with Pega team and business to ensure solutions are aligned with business and system requirements- Acts as the liaison between Business and Technology teams and have ability to translate between technical and non-technical team members- Communicates technical concepts problems and solutions to both technical and non-technical audiences- Develops documentation related to project activities including requirements, process flows, business rules, tests cases and training materials- Leads and facilitates system elaboration sessions to ensure system design is aligned with business goals and product features- Supports continuous improvement of requirements-gathering approaches and Scrum team practices- Ensures that the documented user stories adequately represent the needs of the business and meet all requirements- Proactively identifies and mitigates risk to projects- Participate in all Scrum ceremonies including leading Sprint reviews and playbacks- Work closely with organization to provide estimates for new project initiativesSkills

- Excellent organization and time management skills

- Ability to communicate develop and leverage strategic business relationships across the organization and externally self-motivated team player who excels in a collaborative environment
- Experience with no code configuration rules platforms a plus
- Knowledge of Pega software frameworks and functional design is a plus
- Understanding of process model of big financial institution is a plus
- Strong listening skills as well as oral and written communication skills
- Solid analytical business improvement process modelling and user design experience
- A wide degree of creativity and initiative is expected
- Enthusiastic professional and confident team player with a strong customer success focus who can present effectively even under adverse conditions
